name: Sumiyao Style Lora (manga hentai) lineart and color
description:
I will start by warning that this style tends to generate lolis, BUT WAIT DONT RUN AWAY!!! I just added something like adult:1.4 in the prompt to generate normal things, but this drawing style is amazing and works really well in almost all my generated images as the ones in examples.

If you want lineart monochrome results, add those two words and ensure that in your prompt there arent things like blonde hair or yellow shirt. If it gives you results in grayscale but not lineart, delete monochrome from prompt. If you want color just dont add lineart and monochrome, and specify the colors. All pretty obvious...

The training config was:
24 epoch
5 repeats

2 Clip Skip
Trained on Grapefruit 4.1

Trained on full manga pages from that author, if it generates you text or manga panels, add those two concepts in Negative Prompt

I recommend a weight of 0.8. Use Grapefruit for hentai scenes and Counterfeit for posing and sfw
